سینسوراما مشین نے 3 ڈی ویڈیو، آڈیو، خوشب: What is the Sensorama machine? Sensorama machine features

The Sensorama was designed mid-50s and patented 1962. The arcade-style theater cabinet provided fully immersed film experience by stimulating all five senses. The device included stereo speakers, a stereoscopic 3D display, fans, smell generators and a vibrating chair.
What is the Sensorama machine? Sensorama machine features
The Sensorama was able to display stereoscopic 3-D images in a wide-angle view, provide body tilting, supply stereo sound, and also had tracks for wind and aromas to be triggered during the film.
سینسوراما مشین نے مبہم ملٹی سنسری تجربہ: What is the Sensorama machine? Sensorama machine multisensory experience

Cinematographer Morton Heilig creates Sensorama, the first VR machine. A large booth that could fit up to four people at a time, the Sensorama combined full colour 3D video using a stereoscopic 3D screen, stereo audio, a vibrating chair, smells and atmospheric effects, such as wind.
